title: WINDOWS XP PROFESSIONAL SP3 DVD MULTILINGUAL 24 LANGUAGES
description:
Windows XP Professional - Multilingual Computing - genuine 32-Bit Microsoft System Builder - Updated 6-2008 with SP3.



  If you&#039;re looking for windows XP Professional MUI this (32-Bit) version is the thing to get. I did a clean instal so the only thing u do is, burn to DVD with DVD Decrypter or CloneCD in 4X burnspeed , and make the computer boot from DVD, Install Windows xp Pro Tablet PC in English, Instal Windows XP MUI pack and choose the languages you like to install, for proper working of XP don`t install all 24 languages, a maximum of 5 Languages is recomended!!,  the installation is a cinch, you can switch the user interface in Control Panel from one to any other of the 24 supported languages, and also change the keyboard dynamically from the Language bar in Windows XP. Note: updating will give you no problems!! For questions read the 24 pages installation guide. Min.1.5 GB of available hard-disk space required, every additional language installed will require approximately 115 MB extra disk space, East Asian language support requires an additional 250 MB, a functional and full MUI version of Microsoft XP professional for zero bucks, it cant be beat!!!

  On a computer that is running the English version of Windows XP SP3 with the Windows XP SP2 Multilingual User Interface (MUI) Pack, you can select a non-English language for the user interface (UI). However, text may appear in English in the UI instead of in the selected language. The English text may appear in lists, menus, dialog boxes, product Help, and other locations. This issue affects the following components:  * Microsoft Management Console (MMC) 3.0 * Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP)* 6.1Network Access Protection (NAP)* Scripting binaries

  To correct this issue, i integrated the Multilingual User Interface Pack update for Windows XP SP3 in the XP Pro setup already for you.

For specified language update; <a href=" http://download.microsoft.com/download/6/2/e/62e61f10-e106-4f4c-a862-63eec2b41efb/readme.htm" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://download.microsoft.com/download/6/2/e/62e61f10-e106-4f4c-a862-63eec2b41efb/readme.htm</a>
